title: Singapore Airlines launches non-stop flights to Riyadh after 12 years: New route details, benefits explained
summary_full: Singapore Airlines is relaunching non-stop flights to Riyadh from June 2, 2026, after a 12-year absence. Operating four times weekly on Airbus A350-900s, this service aims to boost business, tourism and cultural exchange between Southeast Asia and the Middle East. The move signifies Riyadh's growing importance as a global hub and enhances connectivity for travellers.
